name: Touch Stars - Another PopStar Style Game
name_original: Touch Stars - Another PopStar Style Game
description:
The famous popstar game come back in 2015!

It is a cool game with nice interface and relaxing music.Addictive and challenging fun for everyone!

Once you play , you will never stop!


How to Play:

- Just tap two or more blocks of the same color.
- Each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.
